examplecode.javacode
Class CodeTests

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--examplecode.javacode.CodeTests
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceTemplate
public abstract class CodeTests
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceTemplate

A class representing the archetypical class from which one can learn code standards through example. Provided above are some of the more common classes used in imports. Note their order.

Version:
1.2 $Date: 2005-01-24 11:51:21 +0000 (Mon, 24 Jan 2005) $
Author:
Joseph R. Kiniry, Daniel M. Zimmerman
See Also:
AbstractClassTemplate, ClassTemplate, CodeTests, ExceptionTemplate, InterfaceTemplate
